typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		StockGroupName as string,
		LineProfit as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		StockGroupName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(StockGroupName = StockGroupName,
		CurrentDate = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(StockGroupName),
	count = countDistinct(StockGroupName)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(input(
		StockGroupName as string,
		LineProfit as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		StockGroupName,
		LineProfit = count
	)) ~> sink1
